DataElement.preferredName: EPIC-CP Questionnaire 8 Past 4 Weeks Rectal Pain or Urgency of Bowel Movements Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation, in the past 4 weeks, of how much of a problem their rectal pain or urgency of bowel movement has been for them, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks EPIC-CP - Rectal Pain or Urgency of Bowel Movements Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Chang et al in 2011, which is used to measure urinary incontinence, urinary irritation, and the bowel, sexual and hormonal health related quality of life in patients with prostate cancer. This instrument contains 16 items._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice (EPIC-CP) How big a problem, if any, has each of the following been for you? Rectal pain or urgency of bowel movements._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
